description:
When an accumulation of rejected invasion plans come together to form a sentient giant monster with a grudge, its first target is the Hinata family. Then a freak accident turns Keroro into a soul that can possess items. He uses his new, phantom-like existence to terrorize Natsumi, whom he blames.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Rejected Operation Bouquet / Keroro, Dear Natsumi
ケロロ ボツ作戦大作戦 であります / ケロロ 拝啓,夏美殿 であります
